OOC: Well, that isn't the best mentality.  Transformers is not merely a brand 
name for living robots that Transform.  It is vast, rich, universe that has 
expanded over the years, but you can't go around calling outside stuff like 
Gobots Transformers(unless you are talking about the line of small cars at 
the end of G2).

--part1_11f.6715da3.2910c15b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
